entry.title: Wednesday: Showers or thunderstorms. High 22 except 13 near Lake Erie.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers or a few thunderstorms beginning this morning. Local amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Wind becoming west 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High 22 except 13 near Lake Erie. Humidex 26. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:07 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low 6.
